abstract: Supreme Court will hear arguments on two cases which ask how principles concerning a defendant's recourse for bad legal work at trial might apply to plea bargains.
snippet: Defendants have some recourse when they get incompetent representation at trial, and the justices are being asked to decide whether they have a similar guarantee in plea bargaining.
lead_paragraph: Defendants have some recourse when they get incompetent representation at trial, and the justices are being asked to decide whether they have a similar guarantee in plea bargaining.

headline.main: Supreme Court to Weigh Effects of Bad Plea Advice
headline.print_headline: Justices to Weigh 2 Cases Of Bad Advice on Pleas
headline.seo: Supreme Court to Hear Cases Involving Bad Advice on Plea Deals
